title: Operation Flashpoint: Cold War Crisis (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
Note: This game can no longer be purchased from GOG.com
- Run "setup_operation_flashpoint_goty.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)

About:
In the depths of the Cold War, the unthinkable happens when Soviet renegades invade the Malden Islands and the USA answers the plea for freedom. For the first time, all three campaigns of the Cold War's darkest chapter are brought together in one box, the most complete combat simulation ever.
Penetrating even deeper into Operation Flashpoint territory, comes Operation Flashpoint: Game of the Year edition. Raw recruits to Operation Flashpoint can experience the impending conflict with just one complete package. The award winning game is fully loaded with every upgrade, add-on and expansion, including all vehicles, weapons and extra campaigns released to date.
Operation Flashpoint Game of the Year Edition contains the original game - Cold War Crisis, the Gold Upgrade (including the Russian campaign Red Hammer) and the latest expansion pack OFP: Resistance
